comment: This file is automatically generated. Do not overwrite!
0c61e973e1e23347be794197b57f91ab: (i)This is a lesson which you need to create. See ${lessonHelpLink}
b33bb0b4617140c80c80b10436a0dbb2: A serious error has occurred. Wait a few minutes and then close this dialog to try to reload the application.
0ee1cf8d6fe2d39a293bc82ddbc60666: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their factory defaults?
5ae903bf09202faef9d5fcedbf21cf14: Select the type of export required. AutoRun files provide an easy way for users to run a lesson.
b087a0f6368816df1cbbf2700e7de192: Are you sure you want to overwrite your lesson?
0fd040b4b27f744bd6c771e624f1a466: Are you sure you want to leave the editor? You will lose your changes.
784dc4bc7f2a0374bd038e01caf85d4d: Are you sure you want to delete this lesson?
d54132fd8e2fa9a6c89e8c27bc122fc2: Are you sure you want to quit the lesson?
a7c4b7db96ceb235072a13b2f6d0a47c: ${appName} has been designed to allow you to create lessons and quizzes quickly and easily by just writing simple, plain text.
f1c6d62749c0daf6f811d81d8e81a0ac: As this is your first time using the application, here is a quick summary of how your data are used and stored.
09c78e9bf1c7828280e85b6422d6e712: - ${appName} holds no account details or personal information.
645a1e1fef8324f7061e6cd82b966b02: - The only data stored are your preferences for using the application and any lessons you create.
85320d2bf19b4540dfca0365564a452e: - No information that you enter when answering questions in a quiz is ever stored or transmitted to the server.
9c56fddb40ff68400351826fd5d07d45: - Data are stored on your device using your browser's localStorage.
a62dab340866f8adb127a1e46f48260d: The application runs on your device and data is not normally sent to the server for processing.
4b1efead862e496bfa2302b9f91e5bca: There is one exception: Autorun files.
4cf4f87c6d6b28c3fbae03a4293fba33: These files are self-launching quizzes which are designed for sharing.
132a6f73c02f839e6a2d24a34c1dadca: When a user tries to launch one of those files, they will be given the option to run the lesson automatically.
9bd174b9a9276996e5c09a5454060925: That process requires the lesson to be transmitted to the server.
687f14ded82f8e827555532b3857829f: The user will always be given the option to skip the autorun feature and load the lesson manually.
8b73f389cf0286a63a4adfb231300c05: - The application is hosted by GitHub, which does log your IP address for security purposes.
f3d5c4e36b478dff85e2fec9c9be9a35: For more details please check out the ${privacyLink} information.
c55bdbb47fee32f4ca56a977427374bf: The application has finished. It will now start again.
